article.title: January 2015 Galaxy Newsletter
article.content:
Happy New Year from the Galaxy Project!

January brings lots of Galaxy related news, including

  • 63 new papers, including 4 highlighted papers, referencing, using, extending, and implementing Galaxy. (There are now over 2000 papers in the Galaxy CiteULike library.)
  • GCC2015 Training Day Topic Nominations close this week!
  • GCC2015 needs sponsors!
  • Other upcoming events on two continents
  • Job openings at 7 organizations
  • GalaxyAdmins is back! Please tell what times work best for the next meetup.
  • Two new public servers: MetaNET and VectorBase.
  • Three new Galaxy Training Resources
  • Over 30 new and updated ToolShed repositories from 12 contributors
  • And, other news too.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
